name: Damnation Army: Our Trash is Your Treasure
name_original: Damnation Army: Our Trash is Your Treasure
description:
Damnation Army is a game about a dungeon keeper who has lost all of his minions to adventurers. In an effort to restore his dungeon, he's setting up a monster charity called "Damnation Army" and giving away all the leftover equipment he has lying about after the bloodshed. All he asks in return is the use of that equipment to defend his lair.

Playing as the dungeon keeper you will:

-Take equipment requests from monsters

-Scavenge the bloodstained wreckage of your dungeon for gear

-Repair the equipment at your workshop with blacksmithing mini-games

-Accumulate points by filling monsters orders in a timely and accurate fashion

Once you've equipped enough monsters, your dungeon will be defended once again and you'll be ready for those pesky heroes when next they strike!

Made as part of the 48-Hour YOGSCAST 2019 Holiday Game Jam (but sadly finished mere minutes after the deadline)

A game by RJ Perry, Grant Beals, and Sam Gates
